thread.title: South of Midnight, Blue Prince and More Coming to Xbox Game Pass Soon
thread.title_full: South of Midnight, Blue Prince and More Coming to Xbox Game Pass Soon

author: Zachary McAuliffe
title: South of Midnight, Blue Prince and More Coming to Xbox Game Pass Soon
text:
Subscribers can play these games and more with a Game Pass subscription. Southern folklore, stop-motion animation and a giant catfish all come together to create the whimsical and magical world of South of Midnight. Game Pass subscribers can play South of Midnight and more games in April.
Xbox Game Pass Ultimate -- a CNET Editors' Choice award pick -- offers hundreds of games you can play on your Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, and PC or mobile device for $20 a month. A subscription gets you access to a large library of games, with new titles like Avowed added every month, plus other benefits, such as online multiplayer and deals on non-Game Pass titles.
Read more: Microsoft's Developer Direct Proved Game Pass Is Xbox's New Norm
Here are the games that Microsoft is adding to Xbox Game Pass in April. You can also check out the other titles Microsoft recently added to the service, such as Atmofall.
Borderlands 3 Ultimate Edition
Coming to Game Pass Ultimate, PC Game Pass and Game Pass Standard on April 3.
Best Buy
Get ready to loot, shoot and laugh your way through the latest entry in the absurd Borderlands series. In this entry, a cult called the Children of the Vault is spreading throughout the universe. It's up to you and your crew of vault-hunting friends to put a stop to it. Play as one of four new vault hunters, each with unique skills; meet up with characters from past games; and get ready to shoot your way through the galaxy.
All You Need is Help
Coming to Game Pass Standard on April 3.
While the game's title sounds vaguely menacing -- even threatening -- this is a quirky co-op puzzle game filled with fluffy cube-shaped creatures that smile and laugh with you. You'll work with others, either online or in couch co-op, to solve puzzles together. This game is perfect for a fun game night with a significant other, children or anyone else.
Still Wakes theâ€¦
Zachary McAuliffe
